summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Endless Path multi-service platform. Backend APIs improved to 94.7% success rate (up from 89.5%). All core user flows working correctly for Customer, Provider, and Admin roles. Frontend fully functional with excellent mobile responsiveness.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized requests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - different error code than expected but functionality works

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all 12 service categories displayed correctly
Customer registration and login flow works perfectly
Provider registration with all 12 categories and role-specific fields works
Admin login with credentials admin@endlesspath.com / admin123 works
Services page shows all 27 demo services correctly
Category filtering on services page works (tested Emergency Services)
Search functionality works (tested with 'car' keyword - 3 results)
Customer dashboard displays 5 free credits correctly
Customer booking dialog opens with proper form fields
Provider dashboard shows pending approval status for new providers
Admin dashboard displays correct stats with 5 stat cards
Admin can access providers and users management pages
Navigation between all pages works seamlessly
Mobile responsive design works on 390x844 viewport
Authentication token persistence works correctly
Role-based redirects work properly
Backend API connectivity (18/19 tests passed - 94.7% success rate)
Service browsing and filtering functionality
About page with subscription plans display correctly
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
